nodes.text: Coduyo'po'nekri, also known by the core name of Yoponek, was a Chiss male of the Coduyo family and the betrothed of Yomie. Yoponek was a student of history.

He and Yomie embarked on a wandering year prior to their final education, choosing to travel the Chiss Ascendancy. When Haplif of the Agbui attempted to study the Chiss in order to spark a civil war within the Ascendancy, he encountered Yomie and Yoponek, offering them passage aboard his starship; he claimed it would save the two Chiss funds and provide guidance for the Agbui, but in reality wished to learn about the Ascendancy.
Yoponek first appeared in the 2021 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Greater Good, written by Timothy Zahn.
